com.samsung.multiscreen

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.Message

  • public class Message
extends Object
    Contains message data when communicating with MultiScreen-enabled devices. If the client is subscribed to a Channel and has added a Channel.OnMessageListener via Channel.addOnMessageListener(String, Channel.OnMessageListener), then this client will be notified when the host or other clients publish messages to the specified event channel.
